title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - An unexpected journey building AWS MCP Servers (OPN401)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建 AWS MCP 服务器的意外之旅 (OPN401)
abstract: This session explores the evolution from generic AI coding assistants to AWS-intelligent development tools through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Attendees will learn how MCP transforms AI assistants by injecting AWS-specific context, best practices, and service knowledge directly into development workflows. We'll demonstrate using 25+ open-source AWS MCP servers that provide real-time access to CDK patterns, cost analysis, Amazon Bedrock capabilities, and infrastructure guidance. Through live demos and examples, you'll discover how to configure and leverage existing MCP servers that understand AWS services. Leave with practical skills to enhance your AI assistants for accelerated serverless and AI application development.
abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了从通用AI编码助手到AWS智能开发工具的演进过程，这一转变通过模型上下文协议（MCP）实现。与会者将学习MCP如何通过直接向开发工作流注入AWS特定上下文、最佳实践和服务知识来转变AI助手。我们将演示使用25+个开源AWS MCP服务器，这些服务器提供对CDK模式、成本分析、Amazon Bedrock功能和基础设施指导的实时访问。通过现场演示和示例，您将了解如何配置和利用理解AWS服务的现有MCP服务器。您将掌握实用技能，以增强AI助手，从而加速无服务器和AI应用程序开发。
